titleStmt.title: Holy meditations vpon seauen penitentiall and seauen consolatory psalmes of the kingly prophet Dauid. Written by the noble and learned G.D.V.
Saincte philosophie. Selection.
titleStmt.author: Du Vair, Guillaume, 1556-1621.
Shute, W.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Guillaume Du Vair. Méditation sur les pseaumes de la pénitence de David, published in the author's La Saincte philosophie.
For a different translation of the first part, see STC 5961.5; of both parts, see STC 7373.4 --STC.
Identified as STC 24564 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
